this_title: Stravinsky and Balanchine: A Genius Has a Birthday!
introduction: (2 ballets choreographed by George Balanchine, with music byIgor Stravinsky)Introductory remarks by Balanchine and Lincoln KirsteinRobert Irving, ConductorPeter Martins, Suzanne Farrell Kyra Nichols, Maria CalegariAPOLLO; Apollo (Martins); Terpsichore (Farrell), Polyhymnia (Nichols), Calliope (Calegari)Martins, Adam Luders, Karin von Aroldingen, Victoria HallORPHEUS: Orpheus (Martins), Dark Angel (Luders), Euridyce (Aroldingen), Leader of the Bacchantes (Hall)(Performance tapings: June 18-19, 1982)
chinese_title: Stravinsky and Balanchine: A Genius Has a Birthday!
